bitmark:
[.article:bitmark--]
[@id:277590]
[%][%FIRST INVITATION TO ISYFLOW]
Dear x,

WELCOME to the Swiss EdTech Collider Platform! We’re happy to provide you access to our platform - a place where members can‘virtually’ connect, check latest news and stats about the EdTech Industry, access the latest newsletters in one single place, check events and opportunities, check important information about the Swiss EdTech Collider and its locations, enjoy pictures of our last events, find documents about the membership and much more…

bit.body:
Dear x,

WELCOME to the Swiss EdTech Collider Platform! We’re happy to provide you access to our platform - a place where members can‘virtually’ connect, check latest news and stats about the EdTech Industry, access the latest newsletters in one single place, check events and opportunities, check important information about the Swiss EdTech Collider and its locations, enjoy pictures of our last events, find documents about the membership and much more…

bitmark:
[.article:bitmark--]
[@id:277591]
In order to be added and get access the platform, please follow the steps below:

bit.body: In order to be added and get access the platform, please follow the steps below:

bitmark:
[.article:bitmark++]
[@id:277593]
•1 Create your login/user (with this message - click ‘Accept the invitation')
•1 Edit your profile (once you are logged in —> icon on top right corner of platform) —> please add your contact information (phone, startup etc.)
•1 Read the General Rules about the use of the new platform (you’ll find the document in the folder ‘Tutorials, maps, documents and more’)
•1 Make yourself familiar with the platform and check out the Isyflow Tutorials (folder ‘Tutorials, maps documents and more’)

bit.body:
•1 Create your login/user (with this message - click ‘Accept the invitation')
•1 Edit your profile (once you are logged in —> icon on top right corner of platform) —> please add your contact information (phone, startup etc.)
•1 Read the General Rules about the use of the new platform (you’ll find the document in the folder ‘Tutorials, maps, documents and more’)
•1 Make yourself familiar with the platform and check out the Isyflow Tutorials (folder ‘Tutorials, maps documents and more’)

bitmark:
[.article:bitmark--]
[@id:277594]
The faster you are setting up the profile, the faster we and other startups can get in touch with you, share ideas, transfer knowledge - also, we are increasingly sending messages, information and opportunities via our membership platform. So join us so that you will not miss any important news!

bit.body: The faster you are setting up the profile, the faster we and other startups can get in touch with you, share ideas, transfer knowledge - also, we are increasingly sending messages, information and opportunities via our membership platform. So join us so that you will not miss any important news!

bitmark:
[.article:bitmark--]
[@id:277595]
We are very much looking forward to 'virtually meeting and seeing' all of you on the Swiss EdTech Collider Membership Platform but also  - and mostly - seeing you ‘live’ at one point.

Kind regards,

Roman

Roman Bruegger
Managing Director
Swiss EdTech Collider

bit.body:

bitmark:
[.article:bitmark--]
[@id:277597]
The Swiss EdTech Collider Platform (firstly launched in July 2018) aims to link the Swiss EdTech Collider Members on a ‘virtual platform and not only is a content/information sharing platform but also a place to connect and communicate with other members, to share ideas, knowledge, expertise and useful, meaningful content about the EdTech world and to combine all in one single place. There are several possible touch points and categories where members can find and share information as well as communicate with each other/with the whole community including leaving feedback and ideas.

bit.body: The Swiss EdTech Collider Platform (firstly launched in July 2018) aims to link the Swiss EdTech Collider Members on a ‘virtual platform and not only is a content/information sharing platform but also a place to connect and communicate with other members, to share ideas, knowledge, expertise and useful, meaningful content about the EdTech world and to combine all in one single place. There are several possible touch points and categories where members can find and share information as well as communicate with each other/with the whole community including leaving feedback and ideas.

bitmark:
[.article:bitmark--]
[@id:277599]
In order to be kept in the loop, you will receive an email notification (to the email registered / user email) every time there is a new post in the NEWS section. If you wish to receive a notification to a specific folder/album you are able to ‘subscribe’ to that specific folder/album and you will receive a notification every time there is a new post/addition/change in that specific folder/album (default is set to ‘non-subscribed’ as we do not want to ‘spam’ your email inbox).
Please check the Isyflow Tutorials in the album/Folder ‘Tutorials, Maps, Documents and more’ in how to ‘subscribe’ to a folder/album.

bit.body:
In order to be kept in the loop, you will receive an email notification (to the email registered / user email) every time there is a new post in the NEWS section. If you wish to receive a notification to a specific folder/album you are able to ‘subscribe’ to that specific folder/album and you will receive a notification every time there is a new post/addition/change in that specific folder/album (default is set to ‘non-subscribed’ as we do not want to ‘spam’ your email inbox).
Please check the Isyflow Tutorials in the album/Folder ‘Tutorials, Maps, Documents and more’ in how to ‘subscribe’ to a folder/album.

bitmark:
[.article:bitmark++]
[@id:277602]
The platform is divided into three main areas (as of today - subject to modification/change):
• Welcome Section
• News Section
• Folder/Album Section

bit.body:
The platform is divided into three main areas (as of today - subject to modification/change):
• Welcome Section
• News Section
• Folder/Album Section

bitmark:
[.article:bitmark--]
[@id:277603]
Most of the sections are informational only – meaning you are not able to post/send anything but on the other hand access all information and content. In the folders/album with more than one subfolder, you can navigate via side menu/scroll option. There are sections were you are able to change/edit information, post content or send messages:

bit.body: Most of the sections are informational only – meaning you are not able to post/send anything but on the other hand access all information and content. In the folders/album with more than one subfolder, you can navigate via side menu/scroll option. There are sections were you are able to change/edit information, post content or send messages:

bitmark:
[.article:bitmark--]
[@id:277605]
[%][%Profile (Top Right Corner)]
The PROFILE section is the place where your personal contact information is stored: name, picture, startup, title, phone number and email. Please keep this information up-to- date so other members can contact you if needed (if other than via Conversations – see below).

bit.body: The PROFILE section is the place where your personal contact information is stored: name, picture, startup, title, phone number and email. Please keep this information up-to- date so other members can contact you if needed (if other than via Conversations – see below).

bitmark:
[.article:bitmark--]
[@id:277608]
[Left Side Navigation] The CONVERSATION section is where you can send messages to either single members or two a group of people (you can choose the individual members from a drop down menu). This is NOT the general chat forum (see below).

bit.body: [Left Side Navigation] The CONVERSATION section is where you can send messages to either single members or two a group of people (you can choose the individual members from a drop down menu). This is NOT the general chat forum (see below).

bitmark:
[.article:bitmark--]
[@id:277611]
The MEMBER FORUM section is where you can add your comments to a specific topic or can add your own topic that you would like to share/have discussed with the whole community/all members. The member forum chats are available and visible to ALL users.
This is the place to change/exchange news for everyone (it’s like the ‘general channel’ in Slack or similar tools).

bit.body:
The MEMBER FORUM section is where you can add your comments to a specific topic or can add your own topic that you would like to share/have discussed with the whole community/all members. The member forum chats are available and visible to ALL users.
This is the place to change/exchange news for everyone (it’s like the ‘general channel’ in Slack or similar tools).

bitmark:
[.article:bitmark--]
[@id:277614]
The MARKET PLACE section is where you can sell something that might be of interest for other EdTech members (e g. office furniture, devices, laptops etc.) The market place is visible to ALL users and also all users are able to post a new ‘ad / card’.

bit.body: The MARKET PLACE section is where you can sell something that might be of interest for other EdTech members (e g. office furniture, devices, laptops etc.) The market place is visible to ALL users and also all users are able to post a new ‘ad / card’.

bitmark:
[.article:bitmark--]
[@id:277618]
The NEWS section is where you read and see the latest news in regards to/around the Swiss EdTech Collider or just general interesting news. This is only a pull-demand section (you are not able to post anything yourself). You can access it either directly through the NEWS section (middle section of the platform) or the left side navigation menu ‘NOTIFICATIONS’.

bit.body: The NEWS section is where you read and see the latest news in regards to/around the Swiss EdTech Collider or just general interesting news. This is only a pull-demand section (you are not able to post anything yourself). You can access it either directly through the NEWS section (middle section of the platform) or the left side navigation menu ‘NOTIFICATIONS’.

bitmark:
[.article:bitmark++]
[@id:277622]
All other folders/albums are visible to everyone. You will find lots of information, links, videos, documents, content in different sections/topics – ==all those folders/albums are ‘pull-demand’ only, meaning you are not able to change/add anything==|bold|.
If you like to leave a feedback you can do so in the Folder/Album ‘MEMBER FORUM’.

bit.body:
All other folders/albums are visible to everyone. You will find lots of information, links, videos, documents, content in different sections/topics – ==all those folders/albums are ‘pull-demand’ only, meaning you are not able to change/add anything==|bold|.
If you like to leave a feedback you can do so in the Folder/Album ‘MEMBER FORUM’.

bitmark:
[.article:bitmark++]
[@id:277626]
The Swiss EdTech Collider Platform is the official, virtual platform for all members of the Swiss EdTech Collider. The platform and it’s content is visible to members only (user/login) and we except from all members to use the platform in a respectful and appropriate way to interact and communicate with each other. Also, please only post content in the public MEMBER FORUM that you find is relevant to the whole community (e.g. interesting news about EdTech, an event that might be of interest etc.). Please also respect the following general communication rules:

• We do not tolerate any discrimination in any form or discussions among co-workers/members of perceived shortcomings or mistakes of other members/co-workers.
• We do not tolerate any discrimination, harassment or offence based on race, color, national origin, gender, religion, and age.
• We do not tolerate discrimination, sexual or other personal harassment or offence.
• We also do not tolerate that the platform is used for spam or any kind of unpleasant, inappropriate postings/communication.

__We reserve the right to exclude users from the platform in any case of abuse, defiance, violation, misbehaviour or misuse of the platform.__

bit.body:
The Swiss EdTech Collider Platform is the official, virtual platform for all members of the Swiss EdTech Collider. The platform and it’s content is visible to members only (user/login) and we except from all members to use the platform in a respectful and appropriate way to interact and communicate with each other. Also, please only post content in the public MEMBER FORUM that you find is relevant to the whole community (e.g. interesting news about EdTech, an event that might be of interest etc.). Please also respect the following general communication rules:

• We do not tolerate any discrimination in any form or discussions among co-workers/members of perceived shortcomings or mistakes of other members/co-workers.
• We do not tolerate any discrimination, harassment or offence based on race, color, national origin, gender, religion, and age.
• We do not tolerate discrimination, sexual or other personal harassment or offence.
• We also do not tolerate that the platform is used for spam or any kind of unpleasant, inappropriate postings/communication.

__We reserve the right to exclude users from the platform in any case of abuse, defiance, violation, misbehaviour or misuse of the platform.__

[@id:277659]
[!Can you complete the following sentence?]
We do not [_tolerate] any discrimination in any form or discussions among co-workers/members of perceived shortcomings or mistakes of other members/co-workers.

We do not tolerate any [_discrimination], harassment or offence based on [_race], color, national origin, [_gender], religion, and age.

We do not tolerate discrimination, sexual or other personal [_harassment] or offence.

We also do not tolerate that the platform is used for [_spam] or any kind of unpleasant, inappropriate postings/communication.

bit.body:
We do not {0} any discrimination in any form or discussions among co-workers/members of perceived shortcomings or mistakes of other members/co-workers.

We do not tolerate any {1}, harassment or offence based on {2}, color, national origin, {3}, religion, and age.

We do not tolerate discrimination, sexual or other personal {4} or offence.

We also do not tolerate that the platform is used for {5} or any kind of unpleasant, inappropriate postings/communication.
